Articles.Content:
I don't really know why, but there's two threads for this!
Well, I'm happy to be proven wrong.

I think its the recovery from the great april disaster. The Kraken's Revenge! Theres a gap in this thread from the October 2012 recovery to April 2013. The other thread has the download link and more recent discussion so maybe lock this one?

Can you add 3 long deployable air brake panels to the sides for strong re-entry and LED lighting to the outside for perimetral night ops? Nicely done but lets make it stand out from the rest. Also the flame lenght seems too large, maybe a shorter more concentrated burn would give a bit of more realism.

Well since this is a dupplicate (and older) thread that doesn't seem to be the one receiving the updates in, I'll close this thread. If you guys are interested in the mod, you can get it here, it's still being updated.

Thread closed.
